Articles.Content: Since I updated to 0.24, the IVA thumbnails (in the lower left corner) have only been changing ~once per second, resulting in a jerky animation. Is anyone else having this problem and is there any way to fix it? Everything else runs fine.
That seems to be a common issue, but there is probably no simple fix, besides switching back to 32 bit.
I think it used to be like this in earlier versions. It's supposed to look more like an SSTV camera feed or something. I kind of like it.
